    • Method Detail

      • rightClickMachineBlock

        public static boolean rightClickMachineBlock(net.minecraft.world.World worldIn,
                             net.minecraft.util.BlockPos pos,
                             net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState state,
                             net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer playerIn,
                             net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side)
        The hand insertion/extraction method for our machine blocks. The player must not sneak. If the hand of the player is empty, it will try to extract something from the machine, on the other side if he has somethin in his hand, the method tries to insert this into the machine. It uses ISidedInventory methodes and also a custom insert function from the machines.
        Parameters:
        worldIn - The world object
        pos - The position of the block
        state - The blockstate
        playerIn - The player, who activated the block
        side - The Side on which the player activated
        Returns:
        Whether a action was done or not
        See Also:
        ISidedInventory

      • canCombine

        public static boolean canCombine(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack1,
                 net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack2)
        Tells, whether two stacks are combineable or not. Copied from the Vanilla Hopper.
        Parameters:
        stack1 - The first ItemStack
        stack - 2The second ItemStack
        Returns:
        combinable?
